Workers, companies and organisations in the solar renewable industry, by developing, informing and training all for a safer working environment. We will offer new and existing solar qualification driven by safety and innovation, inform and assist the solar industry to ensure a safer workplace for the workforce. We will also link and share safety best practice and information to anyone working in the solar renewables industry to reduce risk and protect workers
